Steps: 1. Open app on Android 2. Tap "Sign in with Google" 3. Select Google account

Steps: 1. Open Windows desktop app 2. Click "Sign in with Google" 3. Browser popup opens for auth
Expected Result: User authenticated and lands on dashboard

Steps: 1. Tap "Create Account" 2. Enter name + email 3. Click "Verify Email" 4. Enter 4-digit OTP from email 5. Set password 6. Click "Create Account"

Expected Result: Error message shown - OTP does not match

Steps: 1. Start registration 2. Click "Resend OTP" after timer expires

Steps: 1. Open app 2. Enter registered email + password 3. Tap "Login"
Expected Result: User logged in and lands on dashboard

Steps: 1. Open app 2. Enter email + wrong password 3. Tap "Login"
Expected Result: Error message "Invalid credentials" shown

Steps: 1. Enter demo mode 2. Try to save/edit data

Steps: 1. Go to Settings 2. Tap "Logout" 3. Confirm

Test Name: Add product to cart from grid

Expected Result: Quantity decreases by 1 - total updates
